page.title: 18SHOPPING(CONTINUED)
page.content: ASSISTANT AT TIME OF PURCHASE.VERY FEW SHOPS DEVOTE THEIR STOCK TO ONE SPECIFIC ITEM e.g.THE FISH SHOP ALSO SELLS FRUIT! THERE HAS BEEN A MOVE RECENTLY TO ENCOURAGE PEOPLE TO BE MORE SELECTIVE ABOUT THEIR DIET SO WHAT ARE KNOWN AS 'HEALTH FOOD SHOPS'HAVE OPENED.HERE ITEMS SUCH AS DRIED FRUITS,FREE RANGE EGGS,OATMEAL,MUESILI,BRAN FLAKES ARE AVAILABLE. SHOPS SELLING GOOD QUALITY SECOND HAND CLOTHES ARE ALSO A FAIRLY RECENT INNOVATION.THE INCOME RECEIVED GOES TO A DESERVING CAUSE e.g.DR BARNADOS HOMES OR OXFAM.
